content: this pattern is only in english right now i know a lovely dog called aava she has the most adorable speckled paws when i saw this yarn i knew instantly that i had to work speckled socks for me too yarn miss mothballs soft sock 80% merino 20% nylon 100 g / 400 m 1 skein color birch bark needles 2 5 mm or to get gauge gauge 33 sts and 48 row / 10 cm in stockinette stitch notions stitch markers yarn needle blocking materials notes both socks are worked mostly identically but positioning of the lace panel determines left and right sock so there are different instructions in some places of the pattern when there is only one instruction it is for both socks
